# unselectedItemTintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to unselected tabs.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var unselectedItemTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Configuring selection appearance

- **selectionIndicatorImage**: The image to use for the selection indicator.
- **selectedImageTintColor**: The tint color applied to the selected tab bar item.
